name: Bitbucket MCP
description: Model Context Protocol (MCP) server for Bitbucket Cloud and Server API integration
author: Bitbucket MCP Team

BITBUCKET_PASSWORD.description: Bitbucket app password (used with username authentication)

BITBUCKET_WORKSPACE.description: Default Bitbucket workspace to use when not specified

BITBUCKET_ENABLE_DANGEROUS.description: Set to true to enable dangerous tools (e.g., deletions)

BITBUCKET_LOG_DISABLE.description: Disable file logging when set to true/1

BITBUCKET_LOG_FILE.description: Absolute path to a specific log file

BITBUCKET_LOG_DIR.description: Directory where logs will be written (default is OS-specific)

BITBUCKET_LOG_PER_CWD.description: When true, create a per-working-directory subfolder under BITBUCKET_LOG_DIR

documentation.setup: See README.md for full configuration instructions.
